name: Try Lisbon
description: Lisbon is the oldest city in Western Europe and one of the oldest ones in the world, older than London or Paris. It is also a westernmost capital city of continental Europe and the only one which lies on the shores of the Atlantic. But it is not only about the history. It is about the experience. So see and feel  Lisbon and surrounding areas. If you want to create your own tour or if you have any ideas or questions, please be free to contact me before your booking. Let's mingle.
